install.name: Nurte Facebook Like Box Module
install.author: Nurte
install.description: Nurte Facebook Like Box Module. Module that displays Facebook Like Box into your Joomla site. Created by Nurte. http://www.nurte.pl

param.default: Facebook Like Box Module created by: Nurte

param.name: pageid
param.label: Facebook Page ID
param.description: The ID of the Facebook Page for this Like box.

param.name: width
param.label: Width
param.description: The width of the module in pixels.

param.name: height
param.label: Height
param.description: The height of the module in pixels.

param.name: connections
param.label: Connections
param.description: Show a sample of this many users who have liked this Page.

param.name: stream
param.label: Stream
param.description: Show the profile stream for the public profile.

param.name: logobar
param.label: Show header
param.description: Show the 'Find us on Facebook' bar at top. Only shown when either stream or connections are present.

param.default: Linking to your css file allows you to customize the appearance of Facebook Like Box. '?1' at the end of the css link is the cache level for the facebook like box. Every time you make changes to the css inside your stylesheet you must change the number after the question mark.
